resources.string:
Heads up!

This site is owned by %s.\n%s runs a major tracking network.
In fact, %s trackers lurk on about %s of top sites. ðŸ˜±
%sI\'ll alert you to these practices with a low privacy grade. I\'ll also block %s trackers when you browse non-%s sites.

Every site has a privacy grade. Tap it to see how I protected your privacy.

Want to get fancy? Try clearing your data by hitting the fire button.
